categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Resinn was a prosecutor in the Alliance to Restore the Republic who served aboard the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Independence during the Galactic Civil War. Shortly before the Battle of Endor, Resinn led the prosecution of the Hurrim pirate leader Golov Nakhym after he was arrested by Alliance forces for opening fire on civilian ships during a joint raid on an Imperial convoy. In preparation for the case, Alliance High Command sent an e-mail to all personnel requesting anybody with information on the Hurrim's previous activities to contact Resinn.
Resinn was created for the 1999 video game Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance. The character does not appear in the game but is mentioned in an e-mail sent to the player character, Ace Azzameen.
